channel.title: [PI] making trade disabled for a player
channel.description: How can i do it like...the particular player cant trade. It was easy in Delta but how to do it in PI. I want it so that ::pickup people cant trade.

item.title: [PI] making trade disabled for a player
item.dc:creator: @Sagi Sagi
item.description:
@Sagi wrote:

I need for a player (not admin) to have trade disabled…

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @_Haste1 #Haste
item.description:
@_Haste1 wrote:

I think he wants players that have ::pickup rights. I think he wants that so they cannot trade.

@Above post

item.title: [PI] making trade disabled for a player
item.dc:creator: @zattion zattion
item.description:
@zattion wrote:

how to disable it for admins:

->go in config.java

the u see:

public static final boolean ADMIN_CAN_TRADE = true; //can admins trade? public static final boolean ADMIN_CAN_SELL_ITEMS = true; // can admins sell items? public static final boolean ADMIN_DROP_ITEMS = true; // can admin drop items?

change that to:

public static final boolean ADMIN_CAN_TRADE = false; //can admins trade? public static final boolean ADMIN_CAN_SELL_ITEMS = false; // can admins sell items? public static final boolean ADMIN_DROP_ITEMS = false; // can admin drop items?

Read full topic
item.source: [PI] making trade disabled for a player
